item.title: Noveny Sweet Almond Cold-Pressed Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Sweet Almond Cold-Pressed Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Face Care, Nail Care, Hair, Lip care and Baby Massage (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. FACE CARE: Almond oil has antioxidant properties that fight wrinkles and reduce sagging of the skin. Massage 2 drops of almond oil on face and under the eyes before going to sleep every night.
  2. BABY MASSAGE: Almond oil is the best massage oils for babies and adults, almond oil is rich in antioxidants, proteins and Omega 3. Use just 5 drops of almond oil and massage.
  3. HAIR CARE: Almond oil helps in promoting hair growth and it nourishes and strengthens your hair. Warm 1 tbsp of Almond oil and massage it on the scalp every night to nourish hair and make it stronger.
  4. LIP CARE: Almond oil massage on lips will rejuvenate the dead cells, prevent chapped lips and keep them moisturized. Apply 2 drops of almond oil on lips for protection, care and nourishment.
  5. NAIL CARE: Almond oil helps to protect cuticles of the nails and keeps our nails healthy. Use 3 drops of almond oil on nails & cuticles for nourishment, protection and health.
  6. USE AS A MASSAGE OIL: Almond Oil is one of the best massage oil for babies & adults.
  7. Cold Pressed process retains all the goodness as the extraction process does not use heat or harmful chemicals.

The post Noveny Sweet Almond Cold-Pressed Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Sweet Almond Cold-Pressed Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Onion Seed Cold-Pressed Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Onion Seed Cold-Pressed Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Skin Care, Hair Care, Cold & Cough and Insect Repellent (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. HAIR CARE: Onion seed Oil nourishes and stimulates scalp and helps in encouraging the growth of new hair. Mix 3 drops of onion seed oil in 10 ml of coconut or olive, and apply on scalp and massage.
  2. NOURISHES THE SKIN: Onion Seed Oil keeps the skin healthy and fresh and clears the face off acne and fungus, making s fresh and pretty. Add 3 drops of onion seed oil to 2 tbsp of carrier oil and massage on skin and face helps increase blood circulation and improves the overall appearance of your skin.
  3. FOR COLD & COUGH: Onion seed oil is useful in clearing the throat and the nasal tract of the mucus and congestion. Apply 5 drops of onion seed oil on chest and rub if suffering from cold.
  4. HEALS WOUNDS: Onion seed oil has anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties that help to heal wounds. Apply 3 drops of onion seed oil on wound so as to cure infection and heal wounds.
  5. USE AS A INSECT REPELLENT: Onion Seed oil is the best used as a insect repellent as well as a form of sting treatment. Apply 5 drops of onion seed oil on open skin areas so as to reduce the pain caused from honeybee stings and insect bites.
  6. CONTROL BLOOD SUGAR LEVELS: Adding 2 drops of onion seed oil to food helps in controlling blood sugar levels.
  7. Cold Pressed process retains all the goodness as the extraction process does not use heat or harmful chemicals.

The post Noveny Onion Seed Cold-Pressed Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Onion Seed Cold-Pressed Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Moroccan Argan Cold-Pressed Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Moroccan Argan Cold-Pressed Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Acne Control, Anti-aging, Hair Care, Lip & Nail Care (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. HAIR CARE: Argan oil nourishes hair follicles and promotes hair growth.It is good for curly hair and manages frizz. Apply 3 drops to freshly washed and towel-dried hair to manage frizz. Good for curly hair.
  2. ACNE CONTROL: Argan oil has anti-oxidant properties helps to control acne and keep your skin healthy. Apply 3 drops on face in smooth circular motion to moisturize skin so as to control acne.
  3. ANTI-AGING: Argan Oil has anti-oxident properties that combats the signs of ageing. Apply 2-3 drops on face and neck to massage regularly before going to bed.
  4. NAIL CARE: Argan oil helps to protect cuticles of the nails and keeps our nails healthy. For nail health, apply 3 drops over nails, cuticles and finer skin and massage.
  5. LIP CARE: Argan oil helps to moisturize and soften the lips and keep them from being damaged due to dehydration. Gently massage 2 drops onto your lip to keep them soft and moistured.
  6. HAIR CONDITIONING: Apply 5 drops of Argan oil to freshly washed and towel-dried hair to manage frizz.
  7. Cold Pressed process retains all the goodness as the extraction process does not use heat or harmful chemicals.

The post Noveny Moroccan Argan Cold-Pressed Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Lemongrass Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Lemongrass Essential Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Face Care, Hair care, Insect repellent, Massage & Aroma diffusers (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. FACE CLEANING: Lemongrass oil has antiseptic properties that cleanses the pores, remove the toxins and dirt from the skin. Mix 2 drops of lemongrass oil in 5ml of coconut oil to cleanse the pores and make skin look good.
  2. HAIR CARE: Lemongrass Oil contains anti-fungal properties that helps in treating scalp infection and helps in reducing dandruff. Add 5 drops of lemongrass oil to 5 tsp of coconut oil. Gently massage and leave it for 1 hour before washing to get relief from dandruff.
  3. REFRESHING AROMA: Lemongrass has mood enhancing fragrance, lemongrass oil is used popularly in aromatherapy and as a home fragrance. Add 10 drops per 200 ml water in a diffuser for refreshing mood.
  4. INSECT REPELLENT: Lemongrass Oil has a fresh lemony and earthy aroma and used to repel insects and mosquitoes naturally. Mix 15 drops into water in a spray bottle to get rid of insects.
  5. HOUSE CLEANING : Lemongrass oil is used as an air freshener.Its aroma helps create a refreshing atmosphere at home. Mix 20 drops into water in a spray bottle for spraying at home. It also helps in cleaning and makes air fresh.
  6. BODY MASSAGE: Lemongrass oil is used in massage therapy. Blend 3 drops of oil in carrier oil for relaxing massage therapy.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Lemongrass Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Lemongrass Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Herbal Eucalyptus Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Herbal Eucalyptus Essential Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Acne control, Hair Care, Room diffuser, For Cold & Cough and Pain Relief (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. ACNE CONTROL & FACE CARE: Eucalyptus oil has antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties that helps in controlling Acne. Mix 2 drops of Eucalyptus anti-bacterial oil with a little water or moisturizer to get rid of acne.
  2. FOR COLD & COUGH: Eucalyptus oil is useful in clearing the throat and the nasal tract of the mucus and congestion. Apply 5 drops of eucalyptus oil on chest and rub to get relief from cold & cough.
  3. HAIR CARE: Eucalyptus Oil helps in fighting against dandruff with its anti-fungal properties and keeps lice away as well.Mix 3 drops of Eucalyptus oil into carrier oil and gently massage on the scalp. Wash after an hour.
  4. REFRESHING AROMA: Eucalyptus oil has a minty smell with a hint of honey. It has pungent, intoxicating scent. Add 5-10 drops of Eucalyptus oil to per 200ml water for a room diffuser.
  5. MUSCLES PAIN RELIEF: Eucalyptus oil is antispasmodic and gives relief to strained muscles. It re-energizes the muscles and helps in faster healing. Mix 5 drops of Eucalyptus oil with 1-2 tsp of a carrier oil for a relaxing massage and muscles pain.
  6. MIX WITH CARRIER OILS: Mix 2 drops of Carrot Seed Oil with carrier oil to use on hair ,face and muscle pain relief.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Herbal Eucalyptus Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Herbal Eucalyptus Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Therapeutic Lemon Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Therapeutic Lemon Essential Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Acne Control, Face Cleaning, Anti-aging, Massage and Aroma Diffuser (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. ANTI-AGING: Lemon Oil helps in anti-aging effects.It reduces scars and any other skin trauma and makes skin look smooth.Add 2-3 drops of lemon oil to 2 tbsp of facial cream to help remove dead skin cells and make skin look lighten.
  2. FACE CARE & ACNE CONTROL: Lemon oil has antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties that helps in controlling acne and removes dead skin cells.Use 2-3 drops of lemon oil and apply on face for excessive oil and to make face acne free.
  3. REFRESHING AROMA: Lemon Essential Oil has a powerfully fresh traditional lemon fragrance that is quite energizing and uplifting.Add 5-10 drops of lemon oil to diffuser for a room diffuser.
  4. USE AS A FACE CLEANSER: Lemon oil is used as a face cleanseras it reduces excessive oil on the skin.Add a few drops of the oil to facial cleanser to help remove dead skin cells.
  5. NECK MASSAGE: Lemon oil is used in neck massage as its soothing and cooling properties gives relief to pain.Mix 2-3 drops of lemon oil and 2-3 drops of coconut oil and massage on the back of the neck to get relief.
  6. USE IN DRINKING WATER: Add 2 drops in 1 glass of warm water for gargle to make throat feel relax.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Therapeutic Lemon Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Therapeutic Lemon Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Sweet Orange Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Sweet Orange Essential Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Acne control, Skin Lightening, hair, Lip care and Aroma Diffusers (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. ACNE CONTROL & FACE CARE: Orange Oil has antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties helps in controlling Acne.Dilute 4 drops of orange oil in 3 tsp of aloe vera gel and apply for acne relief.
  2. HAIR CARE & GROWTH: Orange oil helps in promoting hair growth and prevents from fungal infection.Add about 40-50 drops of orange oil to 250ml conditioner bottle. Mix with regular shampoo and cleanses.
  3. REFRESHING AROMA: The fresh, tangy scent of orange oil invigorates and sharpens your senses.Diffuse at home, or add to shower gel for a stress-reducing, refreshing and uplifting citrus aroma.
  4. LIP CARE: Orange oil provides hydration and locks moisture for soft and nourished lips.Mix 1/2 of cocoa and mango butter and add 4 drops of Orange oil to keep lips soft and nourished.
  5. SKIN LIGHTENING: Orange oil can aid in skin lightening since it reduces inflammation and treats dry skin.Mix 4 drops of orange oil in 1 tsp of coconut or almond oil and massage for skin lightening.
  6. MASSAGE FOR GLOWING SKIN: Mix 3 drops of orange oil in oils like (coconut oil, jojoba oil or almond oil) for skin lightening and massage for skin benefits.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Sweet Orange Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Sweet Orange Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Australian Tea Tree Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Australian Tea Tree Essential Oil, 100% Pure & Natural For Acne control, Hair care, Nail & toe infection, Home Cleaning and Aroma Diffusers (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. ACNE CONTROL: Tea Tree Oil has antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties helps in controlling Acne. Mix 2 drops of tea tree oil with 1 tsp coconut oil for acne prone skin.
  2. NAIL & TOE INFECTION: Tea Tree Oil has an excellent anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory agent that helps in treating skin and nail infections.Mix 5 drops of tea tree oil with 5 ml of almond oil. Apply using a cotton ball on the infected area.
  3. HAIR CARE: Tea Tree Oil helps in fighting against dandruff with its anti-fungal properties and keeps lice away as well.Mix 5 drops of tea tree oil with 10 ml in any of coconut, jojoba, almond oil and apply to scalp and hair.
  4. REFRESHING AROMA: Tea Tree Oil is used in diffuser as it naturally combat the odor as well as freshen the air.Add 5-10 drops per 200ml water in a diffuser to freshen up the air.
  5. CLEAN & TIDY HOME: Tea Tree oil has anti-microbial and disinfectant properties that kill the germs and pathogens.Mix 10-20 drops to 1 cup of water and spray to get home rid of germs & bed bugs.
  6. REMOVES LICE: Mix 1 drop of tea tree oil per 1 oz. of the regular shampoo to remove lice.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Australian Tea Tree Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Australian Tea Tree Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Carrot Seed Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Carrot Seed Essential Oil 100% Pure & Natural For Skin Care, Skin lightening, Hair Care, Face Care, Anti-aging & Aroma Diffusers (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. HAIR CARE & DANDRUFF CONTROL: Carrot Seed oil helps in promoting hair growth and fights dandruff. Mix 4 to 5 drops of carrot seed oil in 10 ml of hair oil for healthy hair growth.
  2. SKIN LIGHTENING: Carrot Seed oil can aid in skin lightening since it reduces inflammation and treats dry skin. Apply the mixture of 2 drops of rose oil, 4 drops of carrot seed oil and 1 tbsp. of Skin Mousse for skin lightening.
  3. ANTI-AGING: Carrot Seed Oil helps in anti-aging effects.It reduces scars and any other skin trauma and makes skin look smooth.Mix 3 drops of carrot seed, 2 drops of lavender with 1 tbsp of Jojoba oil and 2 tbsp of aloevera gel and massage gently on face.
  4. REFRESHING AROMA: Carrot Seed Oil is used in diffuser for its earthy and refreshing aroma which reduces anxiety and stress.Boil 2-3 cups of water and add 5-10 drops of Carrot Seed oil for homemade diffuser.
  5. THERAPEUTIC BATH: Carrot Seed Oil boosts the therapeutic quality of a bath with its sweetly rich and grounding scent.Mix 5-10 drops of Carrot Seed Oil with 1 cup of Dead Sea Salt and pour it under warm running water inside a bathtub.
  6. HAIR GROWTH: Mix 6 drops of Carrot Seed Oil, 4 drops Sandalwood Oil, 2 drops of Carrier Oil, 2 drops Cedarwood Oil, and 1 Tbsp. of Jojoba Oil for hair growth.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Carrot Seed Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Carrot Seed Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.

item.title: Noveny Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil
item.dc:creator: smartcoders
item.description:
Noveny Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil 100% Pure & Natural For Skin, Hair, Face, Body Massage & Aroma Diffuser (15ml, 30ml, 120ml)

  1. RELAXING SLEEP: Add 2 drops of lavender oil on your pillow for a restful sleep. For headache relief, dilute a few drops with a carrier oil (coconut, almond oil etc.) and apply across the temples and forehead. Or add a drop to a tissue paper and gently inhale.
  2. ACNE CONTROL & FACE CARE: Lavender oil works to kill bacteria, prevent and heal acne breakouts. Add 2-3 drops of lavender oil in 10 ml of jojoba oil and use as a moisturizer on a clean face. Reduces red, inflamed pimples & acne.
  3. HAIR CARE: Lavender oil helps in promoting hair growth and fights dandruff. Mix 4-5 drops of lavender oil with coconut oil and massage your hair and scalp.
  4. BODY MASSAGE: Lavender oil is the perfect addition to massage oil to de-stress and relieve tired, tense muscles.Blend 4-5 drops with a carrier oil of your choice for a relaxing massage.
  5. THERAPEUTIC BATH: Use 2-3 drops of Lavender Oil regularly in your water while taking bath.
  6. REFRESHING AROMA: Lavender oil used in diffusers as its smell so good to reduce stress & anxiety.Use 2-3 drops of lavender oil in diffusers to make the surrounding aromatic with soothing Lavender aroma.
  7. Always use diluted essential oils before use as they are highly concentrated and should be handled with caution.Refer Noveny's Essential oil dilution guide or consult our experts.

The post Noveny Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
item.content:encoded: The post Noveny Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil appeared first on Noveny life.
